===Etymology===
Probably from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=れきしか}} compound {{m|zh|歷史家|tr=lek sri<sup>X</sup> kæ|lit=pass by + scribe + household}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''le̍k-sú-ka''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|れきしか|y=kanon|acc=h|dev=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|れきしか|kyu=歷史家}}

# [[historian]]

====Usage notes====
Refers both to a person who studies history academically, and to a person who is knowledgeable about history.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|historian in general}} {{ja-r|史家|しか}}
* {{sense|specifically an academic historian}} {{ja-r|linkto=歴史学者|歴史 学者|れきし がくしゃ}}
